title: Bug 102623: Image cannot be refreshed after importing again
description: When importing a new image into the layout, the image is not refreshed and the original image is still displayed.
OB: After importing a new image 'image1.jpg' into the layout again, the expected behavior is to display the new image. However, the original image continues to be displayed.
EB: When importing a new image 'image1.jpg' into the layout again, the expected behavior is to refresh the image and display the new image. However, the original image is still displayed.
SR:
1. Open the layout
2. Import a new image 'image1.jpg' into the layout
3. Observe that the new image is not displayed and the original image is still shown
